value.info_text:
Attack the target with your melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157%. Half of this damage will be temporal and half physical.

If the attack hits the target may be stunned, blinded, pinned, or confused for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Chance of applying a random effect improves with your Spellpower.
value.name: Warp Blade
Weapon Folding
value.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to your strikes and increasing your armour penetration by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

The armour penetration and damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Braided Blade
value.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If two or more targets are hit you'll braid their lifelines for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Braided targets take 100%, 135%, 163%, 186%, 207% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The damage transfered by the braid effect scales with your Spellpower.

Attack the target with your melee weapons for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage. If the attack hits you'll teleport next to up to 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 random enemies, attacking for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage.

Temporal Assault can hit the same target multiple times and at talent level five you get an additional teleport.
value.name: Temporal Assault
Impact
value.info_text:
Your weapons and ammo hit with greater force, dealing an additional 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical damage and having a 11%, 21%, 25%, 25%, 25% chance to daze on hit.

The daze chance and damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Threaded Arrow
value.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% temporal damage. If the arrow hits you recover 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 Paradox.

This attack does not consume ammo.

value.name: Singularity Arrow
value.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. When the arrow reaches its destination it will draw in creatures in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 and inflict 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 additional physical damage.

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower and inflicts 50% extra damage to pinned targets.

value.name: Arrow Stitching
value.info_text:
Fire upon the target for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and summon up to 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 temporal clones (depending on available space).

These clones are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% damage but shoot through friendly targets.

At talent level three and five you can summon an additional clone.

value.range: <acronym class="variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30, spellpower 100, paradox 300">22.3, 26.7, 30.1, 33.0, 35.5</acronym>
value.name: Precognition
value.info_text:
You peer into the future, sensing creatures and traps in a radius of 22, 26, 30, 32, 35 for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight bonuses) while Precognition is active.

The detection radius will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Precognition
value2.info_text:
You peer into the future, allowing you to explore your surroundings for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns. When Precognition expires, you'll return to the point in time you first cast the spell. Dying with precognition active will end the spell prematurely.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Splitting the timeline is difficult, you will only be protected after the current turn ends.

value.name: Moment of Prescience
value.info_text:
You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.

You've learned to make minor corrections in how future events unfold. Each time you make a saving throw, all your saves are increased by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 (stacking up to a maximum increase of 6, 13, 20, 25, 31 for each value).

The effect will last 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns, but the duration will refresh everytime it's reapplied.
value.name: Spin Fate

value.info_text:
Gain 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 defense and 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% chance to shrug off critical hits.

If you have Precognition or See the Threads active these bonuses will be added to those effects, granting additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits.

These bonuses scale with your Magic stat.
value.name: Foresight

value2.info_text: When the duration of your Precognition expires, you'll be given a vision of your surroundings, sensing terrain, enemies, objects, and traps in a 5, 8, 11, 13, 15 radius.
value2.name: Foresight

value.cooldown: <acronym class="talent-variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">42, 32, 28, 25, 23</acronym>
value.name: Contingency
value.info_text:
Choose an activatable spell that's not targeted. When you take damage that reduces your life below 30% the spell will automatically cast.

This spell will cast even if it is currently on cooldown, will not consume a turn or resources, and uses the talent level of Contingency or its own, whichever is lower.

This effect can only occur once every 42, 32, 28, 25, 23 turns and takes place after the damage is resolved.

Current Contingency Spell: None

value.name: See the Threads
value.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 11, 17, 21, 25, 28 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight values) while See the Threads is active.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

Note that seeing visions of your own death can still be fatal.

This spell may only be used once per zone level.

value.name: Energy Decomposition
value.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming energy damage (all except mind and physical damage), reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:

value.name: Redux
value.info_text:
You may recast the next activated chronomancy spell (up to talent level 1.3, 2.6, 3.9, 5.2, 6.5) that you cast within the next 5 turns on the turn following its initial casting.

The Paradox cost of the initial spell will be paid each time it is cast, and the second casting will still consume a turn.

This spell takes no time to cast.

value2.name: Redux
value2.info_text:

The Paradox cost of the initial spell will be paid each time it is cast, and the second casting will still consume a turn.

value.name: Trim Threads
value.info_text:
Deals 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 temporal damage over three turns to all targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2. If the target is hit by an Anomaly the remaining damage will be done instantly.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Disentangle
value.info_text:
Disentangle the timeline, reducing your Paradox by 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 and creating an anomaly. This spell will never produce a major anomaly.

Additionally you recover 17%, 42%, 62%, 77%, 89% more Paradox from random anomalies (217%, 242%, 262%, 277%, 289% total).

The Paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.

You've learned to focus most anomalies when they occur and may choose the target area with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

You also may bias the type of anomaly effects you produce with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

Additionally random anomalies only cost you 75%, 44%, 31%, 24%, 19% of a turn rather than a full turn when they occur.

Major anomalies, those occuring when your modified Paradox is over 600, are not affected by this talent.
value.name: Bias Weave

value.cooldown: <acronym class="talent-variable" title="Values for talent levels 1-5, talent mastery 1.30">42, 32, 28, 25, 23</acronym>
value.name: Preserve Pattern
value.info_text:
Any attack that would drop you below 1 hit point instead triggers Preserve Pattern, setting your life to 1, then healing you for 11, 23, 32, 41, 48.

This effect causes three to six anomalies to occur as you move from timeline to timeline until you find one in which you're still alive.

These anomalies may not be targeted though they may be biased. This effect can only occur once every 42, 32, 28, 25, 23 turns.

Each time you take damage from someone else you gain one spin, increasing your defense and saves by 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 for three turns.

This effect may occur once per turn and stacks up to three spin (for a maximum bonus of 9, 15, 21, 27, 30).
value.name: Spin Fate
Webs of Fate
value.info_text:
Activate to remove pins. You also gain 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136% movement speed and 32%, 44%, 53%, 61%, 68% pin immunity for 5 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active these bonuses will be increased by 33% per spin (up to a maximum of 131%, 178%, 214%, 244%, 272% and 65%, 89%, 100%, 100%, 100% respectively).

This spell will automatically cast when you're hit by most anomalies. This will not consume a turn or put the spell on cooldown.

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn.

These bonuses will scale with your Spellpower.

value.name: Fateweaver
value.info_text: You now gain 2.6%, 4.7%, 6.5%, 8.3%, 9.9% resist all when you gain spin with Spin Fate (up to a maximum of 7.7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% resist all at three spin).

value.name: Seal Fate
value.info_text:
Activate to increase critical hit chance and critical damage by 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%, 32% for five turns.

If you have Spin Fate active these bonuses will be increased by 33% per spin (up to a maximum of 31%, 42%, 50%, 57%, 64%).

This spell will automatically cast when you're hit by most anomalies. This will not consume a turn or put the spell on cooldown.

While Seal Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn.

These bonuses will scale with your Spellpower.

Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 32, 44, 53, 60, 67 and inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Carbon Spikes
value2.info_text:

Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Destabilize
value.info_text:
Destabilizes the target, inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage per turn for 10 turns. If the target dies while destabilized, it will explode, doing 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage in a radius of 4.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.

value2.info_text:
Pulls a medium, medium, big, big, huge size or smaller copy of the target from another timeline; the copy stays for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. The copy and the target will be compelled to attack each other immediately.

The duration will scale with your Paradox.

value.name: Virulent Disease
value.info_text:
Fires a bolt of pure filth, diseasing your target with a disease doing 49, 64, 75, 85, 94 blight damage per turn for 6 turns, and reducing one of its physical stats (strength, constitution, dexterity) by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45. The three diseases can stack.

Virulent Disease will always try to apply a disease the target does not currently have, and also one that will have the most debilitating effect for the target.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Kinetic Shield
value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a shield that will absorb 24%, 38%, 48%, 55%, 61% of any physical/acid/nature/temporal attack, up to a maximum of 65, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage per attack.

Every time your shield absorbs damage, you convert some of the attack into energy, gaining two points of Psi, plus an additional point for every 68, 57, 48, 40, 34 points of damage absorbed, up to a maximum 2.4, 2.6, 2.9, 3.0, 3.2 points each turn.

At talent level 3, when you de-activate the shield twice the absorbed damage (if any) in the last 3 turns is released as a full psionic shield (absorbing all damage).

The maximum amount of damage your shield can absorb and the efficiency of the psi gain scale with your mindpower.

value.info_text:
Focus energies into a beam to lash all creatures in a line with physical force, doing 163, 221, 266, 304, 338 Physical damage and knocking them off balance for 2 turns (-15% global speed).

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.

value.name: Thought-Form: Defender
value.info_text:
Forge a defender wielding a sword and shield from your thoughts. The solider learns Armor Training, Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Shield Pummel, and Shield Wall as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value2.name: Thought-Form: Defender
value2.info_text:
Forge a defender wielding a sword and shield from your thoughts. The solider learns Armor Rraining, Weapon Mastery, Combat Accuracy, Shield Pummel, and Shield Wall as it levels up, and has +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Strength, +0, +0, +1, +2, +2 Dexterity, and +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Constitution.

Activating this talent will put all other thought-forms on cooldown.

The stat bonuses will improve with your Mindpower.

value.info_text:
Enter a sleeping target's dreams for 7, 10, 12, 14, 15 turns. While in the Dreamscape, you'll encounter the target's invulnerable sleeping form as well as dream projections that it will spawn every other turn to defend its mind.

Projections inflict 50% less damage than the original, unless the target has Lucid Dreamer active.

When the Dreamscape ends, for each projection destroyed, the target's life will be reduced by 10% and it will be brainlocked for one turn.

In the Dreamscape, your damage will be improved by 65%, 89%, 107%, 122%, 136%.

The damage bonus will improve with your Mindpower.

value.name: Timeless
value.info_text:
The world grows old as you stand through the ages. To you, time is different.

Reduces the time remaining on detrimental effects by 4, 7, 8, 10, 11, most cooling down talents by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and increases the time remaining on beneficial effects by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 (up to 2 times the current duration).

value.name: Undead Explosion
value.info_text:
Minions are only tools. You may dispose of them… Violently.

Makes the targeted minion explode for 36%, 43%, 47%, 50%, 53% of its maximum life in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 as blight damage.

Beware! Don't get caught in the blast! (unless you know Dark Empthy: 0% chance to ignore damage)

value.name: Animus Hoarder
value.info_text:
Your hunger for souls grows ever more. When you kill a creature you rip away its animus with great force, granting you a 17%, 44%, 65%, 82%, 97% chance to gain one additional soul.

In addition you are able to store 2, 4, 6, 8, 9 more souls.

value.name: Arcane Vortex
value.info_text:
Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 39, 53, 64, 73, 81 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Arcane Vortex
value2.info_text:

If no foes are found, the target will take 150% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

value.name: Body of Fire
value.info_text:
Turn your body into pure flame, increasing your fire resistance by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59%, burning any creatures attacking you for 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 fire damage, and projecting 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 random slow-moving fire bolts per turn at targets in sight, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 fire damage with each bolt.

The projectiles safely go through your friends without harming them.

This powerful spell drains 0.10, 0.20, 0.30, 0.40, 0.50 mana while active.

The damage and resistance will increase with your Spellpower.

value.require: Level 30, Mag 50; Have cast over 1000 spells and visited a zone outside of time
value.name: Temporal Form
value.info_text:
You can wrap temporal threads around you, assuming the form of a telugoroth for 10 turns.

While in this form you gain pinning, bleeding, blindness and stun immunity, 30% temporal resistance, your temporal damage bonus is set to your current highest damage bonus + 30%, 50% of the damage you deal becomes temporal, and you gain 20% temporal resistance penetration.

You also are able to cast two anomalies: Anomaly Rearrange and Anomaly Temporal Storm.

Transforming to this form will increase your paradox by 400 but also grant the equivalent of +200 willpower to control paradoxes and failures. This reverts back at the end of the effect.
